metadata.title: Diken Shah – Agentic AI & Mobile Engineering Leader | LangChain, LangGraph, iOS Expert
metadata.description: Portfolio of Diken Shah — 13+ years in mobile engineering, now building with Agentic AI, LangChain, LangGraph, and RAG. From banking apps to intelligent agentic systems.
metadata.keywords: Diken Shah, Agentic AI, LangChain, LangGraph, RAG, Agentic AI Engineer, iOS Developer, Swift, SwiftUI, Mobile Architecture, Multi-Agent Systems, Portfolio
metadata.author: Diken Shah

hero.badge: Open to Agentic AI & Mobile Projects
hero.name: Diken Shah
hero.subtitle: Agentic AI Engineer & Mobile Architect

journeyCards.title: The Mobile Foundation
journeyCards.description: Started building iOS apps over 13 years ago — from banking platforms (Backbase, retail & business banking) to healthcare, e-commerce, and IoT. Got deep into Swift, SwiftUI, and Clean Architecture.

journeyCards.title: The AI Pivot
journeyCards.description: Got hooked on Agentic AI — not just using ChatGPT, but architecting real agentic workflows with it. Now hands-on with LangChain, LangGraph, RAG pipelines, vector databases, and multi-agent systems. Also exploring HuggingFace SLMs and task-based models for efficient, specialized AI solutions.

journeyCards.title: Where I Am Now
journeyCards.description: Split my time between leading engineering teams, building agentic AI products, and leveraging LLMs and SLMs in real production workflows — not just demos. Still ship mobile apps when the right project comes along.

expertise.sectionDescription: I work across agentic AI and mobile — from designing agentic workflows to shipping production iOS apps. Here's where I spend most of my time.

cards.title: Agentic AI & Workflow Systems
cards.description: Designing agentic workflows with LangChain, LangGraph, and CrewAI. Building RAG pipelines, tool-calling agents, and leveraging HuggingFace SLMs and task-based models for production-ready AI solutions.

cards.title: iOS & Mobile Architecture
cards.description: 13+ years of native iOS — Swift, SwiftUI, Combine, Clean Architecture. From banking apps handling millions of transactions to complex IoT integrations.

cards.title: Engineering Leadership
cards.description: Managing engineering teams, defining tech strategy, running Agile sprints. I care about shipping fast without cutting corners on quality.

items.title: LangChain & LangGraph — Building Agentic AI Applications
ChatGPT Complete Guide: Learn Midjourney, ChatGPT 4 & More
RAG & Vector Databases — Retrieval Augmented Generation
Software Architecture: From Developer to Architect

timeline.title: Engineering Manager / Agentic AI Lead
responsibilities: Leading a team building agentic AI products using LangChain, LangGraph, and RAG pipelines.
Designed multi-agent systems for document processing and customer support automation.
Set up vector search infrastructure (Pinecone, ChromaDB) for enterprise knowledge bases.
Still own the iOS architecture for our mobile banking clients — old habits die hard.
Mentoring engineers on LLM/SLM integration patterns and prompt engineering best practices.

timeline.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Owned end-to-end iOS development for healthcare and e-commerce clients.
Introduced SwiftUI early on — one of the first teams at the company to use it in production.
Handled everything from API integration to App Store deployment and release management.

timeline.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Worked across food delivery, real estate, and IoT projects. Learned MVVM the hard way.
Transitioned from Objective-C to Swift and helped the team adopt modern iOS patterns.
Got really into unit testing and code architecture during this period.

timeline.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Where it all started — built my first real iOS apps with Objective-C.
Built iOS apps for banking clients using early mobile frameworks and MVC architecture.
Learned the fundamentals of shipping production apps and working with cross-functional teams.

projects.sectionDescription: A mix of what I've shipped — from banking apps that handle real money to agentic AI systems that handle real conversations. Each one taught me something different.

items.title: Interior by Sagar Davda
items.description: Portfolio website for an interior designer featuring project galleries, service details, and client testimonials.

items.title: RichLeaff - Food & Beverages
items.description: A modern food & beverages brand website with smooth animations, menu showcase, and responsive design.

items.title: Bank Of Kuwait Country - Backbase
items.description: Retail banking app built on Backbase platform with account management, payments, transfers, and card controls for Kuwait's banking customers.

items.title: Bank of Riyadh - Backbase
items.description: Business banking iOS app for Bank of Riyadh with corporate account management, bulk payments, and approval workflows.

items.title: Bank Of Mauritius - Backbase
items.description: Retail banking app for Bank of Mauritius featuring fund transfers, bill payments, account insights, and biometric authentication.

items.title: Bank Of Jordan - Backbase
items.description: Retail banking iOS application for Bank of Jordan with multi-currency support, P2P transfers, and push notification alerts.

items.title: Struqture - Project Management
items.description: Construction project management app with task tracking, team collaboration, document sharing, and real-time progress dashboards.

items.title: ClickMall - Ecommerce
items.description: Full-featured e-commerce iOS app with product catalog, cart management, payment integration, and order tracking.

items.title: Waspito - Healthcare
items.description: Telemedicine app connecting patients with doctors via video/audio consultations, appointment booking, and prescription management.

items.title: FairDeal - Service Provider
items.description: On-demand service marketplace app with provider profiles, booking system, video consultations, and rating/review system.

items.title: FoodCourt - Online Food Delivery
items.description: Food delivery iOS app with restaurant listings, real-time order tracking, payment gateway, and push notifications.

blog.sectionDescription: I write about what I'm building and learning — from agentic AI patterns to mobile architecture lessons.

posts.title: Building Simple RAG
posts.excerpt: A practical guide to building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline from scratch — embedding documents, storing vectors, and querying with LLMs for accurate, grounded answers.

posts.title: Download & Run HuggingFace Models Locally
posts.excerpt: Step-by-step guide to downloading HuggingFace models to your machine and running them locally using the Transformers pipeline — no API keys, no cloud, fully offline.

contact.sectionDescription: Got an Agentic AI project you're thinking about? Or need someone who can build both the agent and the app? Drop me a line — I'm always up for interesting conversations.

cta.heading: Building something with Agentic AI?
cta.subheading: Whether it's an agentic workflow, a RAG pipeline, or a mobile app — let's talk.

footer.description: 13+ years of building software — from native iOS apps to agentic AI systems. Currently deep into LangChain, LangGraph, and RAG. Always looking for the next interesting problem to solve.
footer.credit: Designed & Developed with ❤️ by Diken Shah
